title: Help!!! Free Unchained Alistar Skin
body: Pls tell me how to get Free Unchained Alistar Skin in OCE. I want to get one before it gose unavailble.

replies.body: LOL I DONT KNOW WHOS MORE CONFUSED, HOUSE OF FORCE OR THE GUY WHO DID THIS POST HAHAHA

Probably me. I don't know how to get that skin.

Do you know?

well
u get the skin if u sub the youtube channel for lol but we cant get that skin anymore coz u had to be on the na server to sub the channel to get the skin for free, as much as i want the skin n i really really wanted the skin badly, i might just pop into the na server one day just to see if i can get the skin n then come back to oce xD

so it had nothing to do with following lol on twitter (the twitter thing is for Dreadnight Garen) and the skin was never available here in Oceania even if u have subbed lol on youtube, i have no idea why this guy that did this post would think the skin was available in Oceania, if it was i would of found out by now, im not the expert but this is facts haha

I do know that it's advertised to you at some point during the on-boarding process. It's just been so long since I've seen it that I'd forgotten. I do know I got Riot Tristana from liking them on Facebook, NA server or not.

I think that was League of Legends OCE specifically, though. Maybe you can apply the same logic to the other sites?
what.....dude u cant get the ali skin unless u do the presses while being on the na server, that is all,  lol im not going to repeat my self as i just did again
Wasn't it you get that if you follow them on Twitter?
